songs.title: Change (Outro)
songs.lyrics:
[Spoken]
And I feel like, you know
If you're gonna be an artist
There's a time when you just have, you know
Embrace the responsibility
And I'm just sayin' the power of music is something so special
And be able to do it on this magnitude
When you reach millions of people
It's like, why not use that for good?
Why not tell kids something that they can connect with
And use with their lives
And like, really my mission statement from day one
And I'm getting so worked up talking about this
All I wanted to do was help kids not feel alone
And stop kids from committing suicide
